Name: Mean-While
About the game: After an unfortunate confrontation, two rivaling megalomaniacs bent on world domination, are forced to work together in hopes to survive. Join Skeleman, and his rival, Dr. Dangerous, in the thrilling adventure title: Mean-While. Mean-While is a non-linear adventure game where you are stuck as two characters, Skeleman and Dr. Dangerous, trapped in each other's fortresses. To succeed you will be switching between both characters to help aid each other on their journey to the top. Enjoy jumping, slashing, shooting, bombing, bashing, and grappling your way to the end in this comedic retro themed title.
